<title level="1" right="Trait">[Brace](/Traits.aspx?ID=471)</title>

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 24 <sup>2.0</sup>

A brace weapon is effective at damaging moving opponents. When you [Ready](/Actions.aspx?ID=82) to Strike an opponent that moves within your reach, until the start of your next turn Strikes with the brace weapon deal an additional 2 precision damage for each weapon damage die it has.
